name: Brothers & Arms
description:
Brothers & Arms is a game made during the UPsi Jam 2.0.

The theme of this Jam was "Always more",  the game features this idea by adding more zombies each time you finish a level and adds a soldier to your team each time you fail a level.  

Fight your way through zombies with the least amount of soldiers to challenge yourself or enjoy the fun of decimating everything in your way with your personal little army.

Instructions: 

WASD -  to move

Left mouse click - to shoot

Right mouse click - to throw grenades

There is no end to this game, to leave it - press ALT F4
